original_text: Set the trumpet to thy mouth. He shall come as an eagle against the house of the Lord, because they have transgressed my covenant, and trespassed against my law.
korean_text: 나팔을 네 입에 댈지어다 원수가 독수리처럼 여호와의 집에 덮치리니 이는 그들이 내 언약을 어기며 내 율법을 범함이로다

sentences.original_text: Set the trumpet to thy mouth.
He shall come as an eagle
against the house of the Lord,
because they have transgressed my covenant,
